    • Method Detail

      • initCardObserver

        public static CardExchangeViewObserver initCardObserver(Player player,
                                                        PhaseViewObservable observable)
        init a cardObserver for this player to get "exchange time" and player card list Although card list can be get directly from player, doing this is to unify the usage Observer will be deleted before next phase.
        Parameters:
        player - player who will attach to the observer/ongoing player
        See Also:
        CardExchangeViewObserver, deregisterCardObserver(Player, PhaseViewObservable, CardExchangeViewObserver)

      • deregisterCardObserver

        public static void deregisterCardObserver(Player player,
                                          PhaseViewObservable observable,
                                          CardExchangeViewObserver cardObserver)
        cardObserver deleted from two observable
        Parameters:
        player - current player
        cardObserver - observer been removed

      • exchangeCard

        public static void exchangeCard(Player player,
                                int code,
                                int exchangeTime)
        Making exchange in "code" way. Then notify the observable to update exchange time. The armies obtained through exchanging is set to player.undeployedArmy first. Then added to army only when they are deployed.
        Parameters:
        player - player
        code - combo type

      • getExchangedArmy

        public static int getExchangedArmy(int curExchangeTime)
        if the selected cards list satisfies the game rule, this method it will return the exact nbr of exchanged army.
        Returns:
        exchanged army number

      • availableCombo

        public static int availableCombo(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Automatically looking for available combo to exchange
        Parameters:
        cards - cards list with size that is greater 2 (do not required)
        Returns:
        an integer that stands for a possible combo

      • getNewArmyPerRound

        public static void getNewArmyPerRound(Player player)
        New army will be added to player's undeployed army. Same logic as exchanging card for new Army. Never add new army directly.
        Parameters:
        player - current player

      • addUndeployedArmyAfterExchanging

        public static int addUndeployedArmyAfterExchanging(Player player,
                                                   int exchangedArmyNbr)
        The armies obtained through exchanging is set to player.undeployedArmy first. Same logic as getting new army per round. Never add new army directly.
        Parameters:
        exchangedArmyNbr - army number exchanged to be added to the player

      • checkDefenderAlive

        public static void checkDefenderAlive(Player defender)
        is called in cheater attack logic which does not actually attack.

      • callNextRobotPhase

        public static void callNextRobotPhase()
        Method does nothing unless next player is robot

      • endReinforcement

        public static void endReinforcement(Player player)
        Must be Called at end of reinforcement phase. Work out a proper phase to go. Notify observer and auto call robots move until a human's turn.
        Parameters:
        player - current player

      • endFortification

        public static void endFortification(Player player)
        Must be Called at end of fortification phase. Work out a proper phase to go. Notify observer and auto call robots move until a human's turn.
        Parameters:
        player - current player

      • endAttack

        public static void endAttack(Player player)
        Must be Called at end of attack phase. Work out a proper phase to go Notify observer and auto call robots move until a human's turn.
        Parameters:
        player - current player

        public static <T extends javafx.fxml.Initializable> javafx.scene.Scene startView(java.lang.String phase,
                                                                                 T controller)
